mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKINGS (id, start_time, end_time, lesson_id, student_id, instructor_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{lessonId}, #{studentId} , #{instructorId});
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKINGS SET start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, lesson_id = #{lessonId}, student_id = #{studentId}, instructor_id = #{instructorId} WHERE id = #{id}
